original_text: And the Israelites separated themselves from all foreigners and stood and confessed their sins and the iniquities of their fathers.
korean_text: 모든 이방 사람들과 절교하고 서서 자기의 죄와 조상들의 허물을 자복하고

sentences.original_text: And the Israelites separated themselves from all foreigners
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 모든 이방인과 자신들을 분리하고

sentences.original_text: and the iniquities of their fathers.
